name: A. Infinity Gauntlet
statement:
You took a peek on Thanos wearing Infinity Gauntlet. In the Gauntlet
there is a place for six Infinity Gems: the Gem of color, the Gem of
color, the Gem of color, the Gem of color, the Gem of color, the Gem of
color. Using colors of Gems you saw in the Gauntlet determine the names
of Gems.
